content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 42}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 45}]
thought: To craft a soul_torch, I need to place 1 charcoal and 1 stick in the crafting grid. I will first move the charcoal from slot 45 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 45 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 42}]
thought: I will now move the stick to the right of the charcoal, which is slot 4.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 40}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 42}]
thought: Now I need to place the soul_soil under the charcoal and stick, which is slot 7.
act: move from slot 40 to slot 7 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: soul_torch
inventory=[{"type": "soul_torch", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "charcoal", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "soul_soil", "quantity": 1, "index": 7}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 57, "index": 14}, {"type": "lantern", "quantity": 59, "index": 15}, {"type": "zombie_spawn_egg", "quantity": 45, "index": 29}, {"type": "chiseled_quartz_block", "quantity": 39, "index": 42}]
thought: Now that all the ingredients are in the crafting grid, I can craft the soul_torch and move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
